**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-08T03:54:30Z" title="02/08/2017 03:54  AM" data-short="7 yr">February 8, 2017</time> by munlander1**

We moderators generally concentrate on different parts of the forum to make sure the whole thing gets covered, but we do help wherever it's needed. 

It would be very hard to guess about that kind of activity because the forum has busy spells and slow spells. When a new version comes out, I may lock/merge 8 or 10 threads a day due to redundancy, or I might go a couple of weeks without acting on any. Sorry, but I couldn't even take a reasonable guess. And it varies between moderators because some of us have full-time jobs, others help out between classes, and so on.

So do you guys choose what part of the forums you moderate in?
